content: this is a civil case that was heard in the klaipeda district court the case involves the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court has decided to divide the land parcel equally between them with the defendant being awarded the land the applicant is ordered to pay the defendant compensation for their share of the land the defendant is allowed to keep a vehicle registered in their name and the applicant is ordered to pay compensation for their share of the vehicle the court also discusses specific articles of the civil code related to the division of property in a marriage the court has declared the marriage dissolved due to fault on both spouses and has made various orders regarding the division of property payment of damages and costs of the proceedings

metadata.cost:
638.00 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the applicant
€ 858.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 280.00 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
